mapper.insert: insert into GoodsTable(pno, pname, price, psize, pamount, pstate) values (null, #{p_name},#{p_price},#{p_size},#{p_amount},#{p_state})
mapper.select: select pno, pname, price, psize, pamount, pstate from GoodsTable
select pno, pname, price, pstate from GoodsTable group by pname order by pno
